knimeNode.name: Molecule String Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format.

intro.p: Outputs a molecule string in the specified format. The molecule can also be sketched or its string representation be edited in a quick form (web portal).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web portal.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.

A weight value that influences the position of the component in the final layout. Lighter elements will be placed at the top, whereas heavier items will be placed nearer the bottom. The value is relative to the weights of the other components in the workflow (absolute value is not relevant, only the relative comparison to other elements).
The string representation of a molecule.
The format of the molecule string. Please note that not all molecule sketchers support all formats.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
